plugins.name: frontend-pipeline
plugins.description: Automated frontend pipeline with 5 agents (architect, reviewer, debugger, refactorer, chrome-devtools-analyzer), skill-based chain enforcement with agent skill preloading, and MUI/React best practices skills for React + MUI + TypeScript projects.

plugins.name: code-explainer
plugins.description: Explains code with visual ASCII diagrams, everyday analogies, step-by-step walkthroughs, and common gotchas.
